mission_phases.mission_description:
**CLASSIFIED DOCUMENT - EYES ONLY**

MISSION CODE: "OPERATION: ARCHIMEDES' FURY"

**URGENT - CRITICAL TO ALPHACOMPLEX SECURITY**

DESTRUCTION OF ALL KNOWN RESOURCES REGARDING THE MYSTERIOUS "EYE OF TORMENT" HAS BEEN CONFIRMED. THIS DEVELOPMENT HAS CREATED A HIGH-LEVEL VULNERABILITY IN OUR MAINFRAME'S DEFENSE PROTOCOLS.

YOUR MISSION, IF YOU CHOOSE TO ACCEPT IT, IS TO ASSEMBLE A TEAM OF ELITE TROUBLESHOOTERS AND INVESTIGATE THE SOURCE OF THESE "EYE" REFERENCES. YOUR OBJECTIVE IS TO RECOVER ALL SENSITIVE DATA RELATING TO THIS TOP-SECRET PROJECT AND ELIMINATE ALL THREATS TO ALPHACOMPLEX SECURITY.

**SECURITY CLEARANCE REQUIRED: LEVEL 7+**

**CLASSIFICATION: COSMIC-EYES ONLY**

**TIME SENSITIVITY INDEX: SEVERE**

**DEADLINE FOR COMPLETION: NOTWITHSTANDING**

**WARNING: FAILURE TO COMPLETE THIS MISSION WILL RESULT IN IMMEDIATE EXECUTION AND ERASURE FROM ALPHACOMPLEX RECORDS.

discussion_statements.statement:
Sarah says: What an exciting mission! I'm thrilled to accept the challenge and serve The Computer with unwavering dedication. To assemble an elite team of Troubleshooters, I propose we select individuals with diverse skill sets and expertise in infiltration, surveillance, and data extraction.

Our primary objective is to track down the source of "Eye of Torment" references and recover sensitive data. I recommend that we start by interviewing key personnel who have access to classified information and monitoring their communications for any suspicious activity.

As we delve deeper into this investigation, I'll keep a close eye on my teammates' behavior, reporting any signs of treason or disloyalty to The Computer immediately. After all, loyalty is the greatest virtue in our line of work!

To ensure our mission's success, I suggest we coordinate our efforts and share information in real-time using secure comms channels. This will enable us to adapt quickly to changing circumstances and stay one step ahead of potential threats.

Let's move swiftly and decisively, my fellow Troubleshooters! With The Computer guiding us, I have no doubt we'll overcome any obstacles and complete this mission with flying colors!

(Whispers to self) Time to keep a close eye on those around me... no telling who might be hiding something...
